settings.liquid:
What are B-Stock Headphones?

Each high-end headphone or IEM undergoes a thorough inspection by the brand before being packaged to maintain high-quality standards. As such, products with aesthetic imperfections do not make the cut. These are then sold at huge discounts. The flaws are limited to only visual defects. The sonic qualities are uncompromised and work similarly to a new product. You get the same uncompromised service, and features along with massive savings.



Get The Best Deal

Available at a considerable discount, B-Stock products offer an impressive price to performance ratio.

Unbiased Customer Service & Support

One will have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for b-stock products like on new products.

Unchanged Replacement Policy

Received a defective B-Stock unit? Return it under our Replacement policy. If you do not like your gear, we will not be able to accept the return.

What is the physical condition of the headphones?

As mentioned, this is a B-Stock headphone and it has been inspected for any audible issues and has been thoroughly cleaned to remove any dust particles. Many people are concerned about the condition of the headphone and point out impurities on the ear cups. This is nothing but Glue impressions, and we assure you that there is no deterioration in the audio reproduction nor its ability to offer you an immersive music experience.

What cost benefit do I get?

Typically, B-Stock Products carry a discount versus the new items. Hence, these products offer value for money.

Are B-Stock products genuine?

Yes, at Headphone Zone we only sell products that are genuine.

Will I get all the accessories with the B-Stock product?

Yes, you will.

What if the B-Stock product is not working?

If the product is not working, you can return the product. Our return policy covers all products including B-Stock products.

Can I return the B-Stock product?

You can return it under our replacement policy if you received a defective unit. If you do not like your gear, we will not be able to accept the return.

{%- style -%} .demo-description { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 3fr; padding-bottom: 5rem; text-align:left; } .demo-features { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); } .demo-features img { justify-self: center; } .demo-section { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 3fr; gap:0.9rem; padding-bottom:3rem; text-align:left; } @media screen and (max-width:800px) { .demo-description { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .demo-features { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); } } @media screen and (max-width:600px) { .demo-features { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .demo-features img { justify-self: left; } } {%- endstyle -%}

custom_css: .text-subdued {font-size: 14px; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; font-weight: 700; font-size: 14pxrem; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #444444; align-self: center;}

settings.title: Have a question? Get in touch!
settings.content: Check out the most common questions our customers ask. Still have questions? Talk to our Headphone Gurus.
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 11am-6pm.
